item.title: About me
item.description: About me Hello! My name is Tomasz Wąsiński. I’m a software developer from Poland with over 5 years of professional experience. I specialize as a backend engineer, systems architect and technical leader. The first language which I reached the production environment with, was Python, and now I’m in love with it, although it’s not always easy. I’m an enthusiast of DDD & clean architecture, and that’s how I prefer to build systems from the ground up.
